timeline.bodyText: Why we remove the if/else block?
timeline.author: yanghua

replies.bodyText:
Why we remove the if/else block?

because if the map does not contain DataSourceReadOptions.PUSH_DOWN_INCR_FILTERS_OPT_KEY, we will set it to the default value, and the default value will result in an empty array, same as the else block. so there is no need to check it.
replies.author: wangxianghu
